question: Comet Encke orbits the sun every 60 years. David's grandfather saw the Comet when he was 37 years old. David saw the comet a second time when he was two times the age his grandfather was when he saw the Comet. How old was David when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
David saw the Comet for the second time when he was 37 years * 2= <<37*2=74>>74 years old.
Comet Encke can be seen every 60 years, so David saw the comet for the first time when he was 74 years - 60 years = <<74-60=14>>14 years old.
#### 14
